entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few showers. Fog patches in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
